note:
I am a Minneapolis-based artist whose journey into the world of digital art took an unexpected turn after suffering a life-threatening stroke.

I have always had a passion for art and music. I have both nurtured and neglected that passion since childhood and now I want to put my energy into art as a way to cope with the trauma and frustration of what life looks like after having a stroke. I find it therapeutic...and I feel that is what art should be.
#BuyIntoArt#ArtForSale #BestArtists
